Body: What is Follow Coin? Follow Coin is a new platform that wants to make the crypto world accessible to everyone. Our goal is to lower the barriers of crypto investment markets by providing tools and services that make interacting, handling and trading crypto coins easy.  If you are new to the world of cryptocurrency it is often difficult to know when to buy which coin. Now Follow Coin is here to help you out. As a beginning trader it is a real challenge to maintain an overview of the market. The learning curve for investing in crypto assets is extremely steep. That?s why Follow Coin connects (inexperienced) users with influencers that know everything about the cryptocurrency world.  With our platform, you can easily copy experienced traders' (called 'influencers') trades, while influencers can monetize their trading knowledge and skills. Every time a trade is profitable, the influencer gets rewarded by the novice users who copied his trades. This reward is a small portion of the profit made by the copier from the trade and is paid in FLLW tokens. This way, our ecosystem creates a win-win situation for both parties.  Why Follow Coin?  - Benefits: Follow Coin's platform will be for the user. They gain exclusive insight in how crypto traders with years of experience trade.
